metadata.title: CVE-2024-38634 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:serial: max3100: Lock port->lock when calling uart_handle_cts_change()uart_handle_cts_change() has to be called with port lock taken,Since we run it in a separate work, the lock may not be taken atthe time of running. Make sure that it's taken by explicitly doingthat. Without it we got a splat:  WARNING: CPU: 0 PID: 10 at drivers/tty/serial/serial_core.c:3491uart_handle_cts_change+0xa6/0xb0  ...  Workqueue: max3100-0 max3100_work [max3100]  RIP: 0010:uart_handle_cts_change+0xa6/0xb0  ...   max3100_handlerx+0xc5/0x110 [max3100]   max3100_work+0x12a/0x340 [max3100]
